metadata.title: CVE-2022-0667 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
When the vulnerability is triggered the BIND process will exit. BIND 9.18.0

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0667` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.9
bind9-dnsutils - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.9
bind9-host - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.9
bind9-libs - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.9
bind9-utils - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.9
bind9utils - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.9
dnsutils - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bind9 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.9').
